title: The Flight of the Gossamer Condor
creator_credit: Ben Shedd, Jacqueline Shedd and Shedd Productions
brief_description: The story of how Dr. Paul MacCready won the Kemer Prize for the first man-powered aircraft that could fly a mile long figure of eight course. Follows the inventor through twelve months of planning and disappointments as he develops his idea from the first crude wing into a sophisticated craft that flies the course.
creator_credit_for_label: Ben Shedd, Jacqueline Shedd and Shedd Productions
